TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TextInfo extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback
Public Class TextInfo Implements ICloneable, IDeserializationCallback

summary.span: 定义特定于书写系统的文本属性和行为，如大小写。

span.span: Defines text properties and behaviors, such as casing, that are specific to a writing system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 书写系统是脚本和拼字表示文本的语言所需的规则的集合。A writing system is the collection of scripts and orthographic rules required to represent a language as text. 类表示书写系统。The class represents a writing system. 应用程序应使用属性来获取为特定对象对象。The application should use the property to obtain the object for a particular object. 如果安全决策取决于字符串比较或大小写更改操作，该应用程序应使用属性返回的对象属性以确保操作的行为而不考虑保持一致操作系统的区域性设置。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case-change operation, the application should use the property of the object returned by the property to ensure that the behavior of the operation is consistent regardless of the operating system culture settings. ## OverridesOverrides 用户可以使用控制面板的区域和语言选项部分重写与 Windows 的当前区域性关联的值。The user might use the regional and language options portion of Control Panel to override the values associated with the current culture of Windows. 例如，用户可以选择以不同格式显示日期，或使用区域性而不是默认货币。For example, the user might choose to display the date in a different format or to use a currency other than the default for the culture. 如果属性设置为`true`，返回的对象的属性值， ，和从用户设置还检索属性。If the property is set to `true`, the property values of the objects returned by the , , and properties are also retrieved from the user settings. 如果用户设置均与关联的区域性不兼容，例如，如果所选的日历不是一个，这些方法的结果和属性的值是不确定。If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the , for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the , the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CultureName As String
public: property System::String ^ CultureName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与当前 对象关联的区域性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the culture associated with the current object.
The name of a culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是从某个特定的区域性创建的，并且 属性返回该区域性的名称。A object is created from a specific culture, and the property returns the name of that culture. 属性始终反映特定区域性而不是非特定区域性。The property always reflects a specific culture rather than a neutral culture. 如果已作为其值，则相应的非特定区域性作为其值已使用的相同语言的任意特定区域性。If has a neutral culture as its value, then the corresponding has as its value an arbitrary specific culture that uses the same language. 例如，属性返回英语的非特定区域性，但相应的"en"属性可能会返回"EN-US"英语 （美国） 区域性。For example, the property returns "en" for the English neutral culture, but the corresponding property might return "en-US" for the English (United States) culture. 如果 对象与特定区域性而不是非特定区域性关联，则其 属性的值始终与其关联的 对象的 属性值相同。If the object is associated with a specific culture instead of a neutral culture, the value of its property is always identical to the property value of its associated object. 同样，属性永远不会反映特定排序。Similarly, the property never reflects a particular sort. 它始终对应于默认的排序顺序。It always corresponds to a default sort order. 例如，西班牙语 （西班牙） 的默认排序顺序是国际排序顺序。For example, the default sort order for Spanish (Spain) is the international sort order. 如果为 es ES_tradnl （西班牙语具有传统的排序顺序） 然后对应是 ES-ES （西班牙语具有默认国际排序顺序）。If is es-ES_tradnl (Spanish with the traditional sort order) then the corresponding is es-ES (Spanish with the default international sort order).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，应用程序不能更改任何当前的属性对象。If the property is `true`, the application cannot change any of the properties of the current object.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前 对象是否表示一个文本书写方向为从右到左的书写体系。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the current object represents a writing system where text flows from right to left.

value.span: 如果文本书写方向为从右到左，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if text flows from right to left; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示书面文本的主导方向和用户界面元素，如按钮和滚动条的相对位置。The property indicates the dominant direction of written text and the relative position of user interface elements such as buttons and scroll bars.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LCID As Integer
public: property int LCID { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取与当前 对象关联的区域性的区域性标识符。

span.span: Gets the culture identifier for the culture associated with the current object.

value.span: 一个数字，标识创建当前 对象所使用的区域性。

span.span: A number that identifies the culture from which the current object was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些预定义的区域性名称和标识符由这和中的其他类命名空间，以及 Windows API。Certain predefined culture names and identifiers are used by this and other classes in the namespace, as well as the Windows API. 在中定义的详细的区域性信息[转全局开发人员中心的区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考主题](http://msdn.microsoft.com/goglobal/bb896001.aspx)。The detailed culture information is defined in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference topic at the Go Global Developer Center](http://msdn.microsoft.com/goglobal/bb896001.aspx). 属性始终反映而不是一个非特定区域性标识符的特定区域性标识符。The property always reflects a specific culture identifier instead of a neutral culture identifier. 如果设置为非特定区域性标识符，则相应作为其值已使用的相同语言的任意特定区域性标识符。If is set to a neutral culture identifier, the corresponding has as its value an arbitrary specific culture identifier that uses the same language. 例如，属性返回 0x0009 英语的非特定区域性，名为"en"。For example, the property returns 0x0009 for the English neutral culture, named "en". 但是，相应属性可能会返回 0x0409 对于英语 （美国） 区域性，名为 EN-US。However, the corresponding property might return 0x0409 for the English (United States) culture, named en-US. 同样，属性始终对应于默认的排序顺序，并且永远不会反映特定排序顺序。Similarly, the property always corresponds to a default sort order, and never reflects a specific sort order. 例如，西班牙语 （西班牙） 的默认排序顺序是国际排序顺序。For example, the default sort order for Spanish (Spain) is the international sort order. 如果设为"0x040A"（西班牙语具有传统的排序顺序），则相应值是"0x0C0A"（西班牙语具有默认国际排序顺序）。If is set to "0x040A" (Spanish with the traditional sort order), the corresponding value is "0x0C0A" (Spanish with the default international sort order).

summary.span: 将指定的字符或字符串转换为小写。

span.span: Converts the specified character or string to lowercase.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance char ToLower(char c) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ToLower (c As Char) As Char

span.span: The character to convert to lowercase.

summary.span: 将指定的字符转换为小写。

span.span: Converts the specified character to lowercase.

returns.span: 转换为小写的指定字符。

span.span: The specified character converted to lowercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大小写语义取决于正在使用的区域性。Casing semantics depend on the culture in use. 对于固定区域性，大小写语义不是区分区域性的。For the invariant culture, the casing semantics are not culture-sensitive. 特定区域性的大小写语义是对该区域性敏感的。For a specific culture, the casing semantics are sensitive to that culture. 如果安全决策取决于字符串比较或大小写更改操作，该应用程序应使用以确保该行为不一致而不考虑系统的区域性设置。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case-change operation, the application should use the to ensure that the behavior is consistent regardless of the culture settings of the system. 但是，只能由需要依赖于区域性的结果，如系统服务的进程必须使用固定区域性。However, the invariant culture must be used only by processes that require culture-independent results, such as system services. 否则，它会生成可能在语言上不正确或已经过区域性不合适的结果。Otherwise, it produces results that might be linguistically incorrect or culturally inappropriate. 区域性的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on cultures, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例更改基于英语 （美国） 区域性中，使用区域性名称 EN-US 的字符串的大小写。The following code example changes the casing of a string based on the English (United States) culture, with the culture name en-US. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CPP/textinfo_casing.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CS/textinfo_casing.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/VB/textinfo_casing.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ToLower(string str) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ToLower (str As String) As String

param.name: str
param.span: 要转换为小写的字符串。

span.span: The string to convert to lowercase.

summary.span: 将指定的字符串转换为小写。

span.span: Converts the specified string to lowercase.

returns.span: 转换为小写的指定字符串。

span.span: The specified string converted to lowercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字符串的长度的输入字符串中可能会不同。The returned string might differ in length from the input string. 有关大小写的详细信息，请参阅 Unicode 技术报表 #21"大小写映射，"发布由 Unicode 协会 (http://www.unicode.org)。For more information on casing, refer to the Unicode Technical Report #21 "Case Mappings," published by the Unicode Consortium (http://www.unicode.org). 当前实现保留的字符串的长度。The current implementation preserves the length of the string. 但是，此行为尚未得到保证，，更改可能在将来的实现。However, this behavior is not guaranteed and could change in future implementations. 大小写语义取决于正在使用的区域性。Casing semantics depend on the culture in use. 对于固定区域性，大小写语义不是区分区域性的。For the invariant culture, the casing semantics are not culture-sensitive. 特定区域性的大小写语义是对该区域性敏感的。For a specific culture, the casing semantics are sensitive to that culture. 如果安全决策取决于字符串比较或大小写更改操作，该应用程序应使用以确保该行为不一致而不考虑系统的区域性设置。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case-change operation, the application should use the to ensure that the behavior is consistent regardless of the culture settings of the system. 但是，只能由需要依赖于区域性的结果，如系统服务的进程必须使用固定区域性。However, the invariant culture must be used only by processes that require culture-independent results, such as system services. 否则，它会生成可能在语言上不正确或已经过区域性不合适的结果。Otherwise, it produces results that might be linguistically incorrect or culturally inappropriate. 区域性的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on cultures, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例更改基于英语 （美国） 区域性中，使用区域性名称 EN-US 的字符串的大小写。The following code example changes the casing of a string based on the English (United States) culture, with the culture name en-US. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CPP/textinfo_casing.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CS/textinfo_casing.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/VB/textinfo_casing.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToTitleCase(string str) cil managed
Public Function ToTitleCase (str As String) As String

param.name: str
param.span: 转换为标题大写的字符串。

span.span: The string to convert to title case.

summary.span: 将指定字符串转换为标题大写（全部大写将被视为首字母缩写的词不包含在内）。

span.span: Converts the specified string to title case (except for words that are entirely in uppercase, which are considered to be acronyms).

returns.span: 转换为标题大写的指定字符串。

span.span: The specified string converted to title case.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，首字母大小写将为大写的单词的第一个字符和其余的字符转换为小写。Generally, title casing converts the first character of a word to uppercase and the rest of the characters to lowercase. 但是，此方法当前不提供正确的大小写要转换为全部大写，例如首字母缩写的词。However, this method does not currently provide proper casing to convert a word that is entirely uppercase, such as an acronym. 下表显示方法的方式呈现几个字符串。The following table shows the way the method renders several strings. |输入Input|语言Language|预期的结果Expected result|实际结果Actual result| |-----------|--------------|---------------------|-------------------| |安心地 warwar and peace|英语English|安心地 warWar and Peace|安心地 warWar And Peace| |每个 anhalter durch 死气沉沉 GalaxisPer anhalter durch die Galaxis|德语German|每个 Anhalter durch 死气沉沉 GalaxisPer Anhalter durch die Galaxis|每个 Anhalter Durch 死气沉沉 GalaxisPer Anhalter Durch Die Galaxis| |les naufragés d'ythaqles naufragés d'ythaq|法语French|Les Naufragés d'YthaqLes Naufragés d'Ythaq|Les Naufragés D'ythaqLes Naufragés D'ythaq| 如上所示，方法提供的任意大小写行为并不一定语言方面的正确。As illustrated above, the method provides an arbitrary casing behavior which is not necessarily linguistically correct. 语言方面的正确解决方案将需要其他规则，并且对当前算法是某种程度上简单和快速。A linguistically correct solution would require additional rules, and the current algorithm is somewhat simpler and faster. 我们保留将来进行此 API 速度较慢的权利。We reserve the right to make this API slower in the future. 当前实现方法生成输入字符串的长度相同的输出字符串。The current implementation of the method yields an output string that is the same length as the input string. 但是，此行为不能保证，并且无法更改在将来的实现。However, this behavior is not guaranteed and could change in a future implementation. ## Examples 下面的示例基于英语（美国）区域性（区域性名称为 en-US）更改字符串的大小写。The following example changes the casing of a string based on the English (United States) culture, with the culture name en-US. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CPP/textinfo_casing.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CS/textinfo_casing.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/VB/textinfo_casing.vb#1)] 下面的示例将数组中的每个字符串传递至 方法。The following example passes each string in an array to the method. 字符串包含适当的标题字符串以及首字母缩写词。The strings include proper title strings as well as acronyms. 通过使用 en-US 区域性的约定将字符串转换为标题大小写。The strings are converted to title case by using the conventions of the en-US culture. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo.ToTitleCase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.textinfo.totitlecase/cs/totitlecase2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo.ToTitleCase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.textinfo.totitlecase/vb/totitlecase2.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

summary.span: 将指定的字符或字符串转换为大写。

span.span: Converts the specified character or string to uppercase.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance char ToUpper(char c) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ToUpper (c As Char) As Char

span.span: The character to convert to uppercase.

summary.span: 将指定的字符转换为大写。

span.span: Converts the specified character to uppercase.

returns.span: 转换为大写的指定字符。

span.span: The specified character converted to uppercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大小写语义取决于正在使用的区域性。Casing semantics depend on the culture in use. 对于固定区域性，大小写语义不是区分区域性的。For the invariant culture, the casing semantics are not culture-sensitive. 特定区域性的大小写语义是对该区域性敏感的。For a specific culture, the casing semantics are sensitive to that culture. 如果安全决策取决于字符串比较或大小写更改操作，该应用程序应使用以确保该行为不一致而不考虑系统的区域性设置。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case-change operation, the application should use the to ensure that the behavior is consistent regardless of the culture settings of the system. 但是，只能由需要依赖于区域性的结果，如系统服务的进程必须使用固定区域性。However, the invariant culture must be used only by processes that require culture-independent results, such as system services. 否则，它会生成可能在语言上不正确或已经过区域性不合适的结果。Otherwise, it produces results that might be linguistically incorrect or culturally inappropriate. 区域性的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on cultures, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例更改基于英语 （美国） 区域性中，使用区域性名称 EN-US 的字符串的大小写。The following code example changes the casing of a string based on the English (United States) culture, with the culture name en-US. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CPP/textinfo_casing.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CS/textinfo_casing.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/VB/textinfo_casing.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ToUpper(string str) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ToUpper (str As String) As String

param.name: str
param.span: 要转换为大写的字符串。

span.span: The string to convert to uppercase.

summary.span: 将指定的字符串转换为大写。

span.span: Converts the specified string to uppercase.

returns.span: 转换为大写的指定字符串。

span.span: The specified string converted to uppercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字符串的长度的输入字符串中可能会不同。The returned string might differ in length from the input string. 有关大小写的详细信息，请参阅 Unicode 技术报表 #21"大小写映射，"发布由 Unicode 协会 (http://www.unicode.org)。For more information on casing, refer to the Unicode Technical Report #21 "Case Mappings," published by the Unicode Consortium (http://www.unicode.org). 当前实现保留的字符串的长度。The current implementation preserves the length of the string. 但是，此行为尚未得到保证，，更改可能在将来的实现。However, this behavior is not guaranteed and could change in future implementations. 大小写语义取决于正在使用的区域性。Casing semantics depend on the culture in use. 对于固定区域性，大小写语义不是区分区域性的。For the invariant culture, the casing semantics are not culture-sensitive. 特定区域性的大小写语义是对该区域性敏感的。For a specific culture, the casing semantics are sensitive to that culture. 如果安全决策取决于字符串比较或大小写更改操作，该应用程序应使用以确保该行为不一致而不考虑系统的区域性设置。If a security decision depends on a string comparison or a case-change operation, the application should use the to ensure that the behavior is consistent regardless of the culture settings of the system. 但是，只能由需要依赖于区域性的结果，如系统服务的进程必须使用固定区域性。However, the invariant culture must be used only by processes that require culture-independent results, such as system services. 否则，它会生成可能在语言上不正确或已经过区域性不合适的结果。Otherwise, it produces results that might be linguistically incorrect or culturally inappropriate. 区域性的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on cultures, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例更改基于英语 （美国） 区域性中，使用区域性名称 EN-US 的字符串的大小写。The following code example changes the casing of a string based on the English (United States) culture, with the culture name en-US. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CPP/textinfo_casing.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/CS/textinfo_casing.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.TextInfo_casing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.TextInfo_casing/VB/textinfo_casing.vb#1)]

span.span: is null.
